alert.note: Alert for Aguila Valley; Tonopah Desert (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 4:40PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 530 PM MST... At 438 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles north of Tonopah. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could generate localized blowing dust and brief heavy rain. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of Maricopa County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
